title: Provides that owners of private real property exempt from taxation shall give municipalities notice of intention to sell
summary: Provides that owners of private real property exempt from taxation shall give municipalities notice of intention to sell.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1887

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                   January 13, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sens. OPPENHEIMER, DIAZ, DILAN, KRUEGER, SAMPSON -- read
         twice and ordered printed, and when printed to  be  committed  to  the
         Committee on Local Government

       AN  ACT  to  amend  the  real property tax law, in relation to requiring
         notice of intention to sell exempt real property

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.    The  real  property  tax law is amended by adding a new
    2  section 496 to read as follows:
    3    S 496. NOTICE OF INTENTION TO SELL PRIVATE PROPERTY EXEMPT  FROM  REAL
    4  PROPERTY  TAXATION. OWNERS OF PRIVATE PROPERTY EXEMPT FROM REAL PROPERTY
    5  TAXATION UNDER SECTIONS  FOUR  HUNDRED  FOUR,  FOUR  HUNDRED  SIX,  FOUR
    6  HUNDRED EIGHT, FOUR HUNDRED TEN, FOUR HUNDRED TEN-A, FOUR HUNDRED TEN-B,
    7  FOUR  HUNDRED TWELVE, FOUR HUNDRED TWELVE-A, FOUR HUNDRED TWELVE-B, FOUR
    8  HUNDRED FOURTEEN, FOUR HUNDRED TWENTY-A AND  FOUR  HUNDRED  TWENTY-B  OF
    9  THIS ARTICLE MUST PROVIDE NOTIFICATION BY CERTIFIED MAIL OF INTENTION TO
   10  SELL  SUCH  PROPERTY  TO  EACH COUNTY, MUNICIPALITY, SCHOOL DISTRICT, OR
   11  OTHER PUBLIC ENTITY FROM  WHOSE  TAXATION  THE  OWNER  IS  EXEMPT.  SUCH
   12  NOTIFICATION  MUST BE RECEIVED AT LEAST THIRTY DAYS BEFORE SUCH PROPERTY
   13  IS LISTED OR ADVERTISED FOR SALE OR, IF THE PROPERTY IS  NOT  LISTED  OR
   14  ADVERTISED FOR SALE, AT LEAST THIRTY DAYS BEFORE THE CONTRACT OF SALE IS
   15  SIGNED.    SUCH  OWNER  SHALL  PROVIDE  A  CERTIFIED  COPY OF THE NOTICE
   16  REQUIRED PURSUANT TO THIS SECTION TO THE PURCHASER AT THE TIME OF TRANS-
   17  FER OF TITLE.
   18    S 2. This act shall take effect on the sixtieth  day  after  it  shall
   19  have become a law.


        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD06207-01-1
